snippet: Reasonable people may differ on how best to set fees paid to health-care providers, but it is beyond dispute that the current system is inefficient and far too costly, an economist writes.
abstract: Reasonable people may differ on how best to set fees paid to health-care providers, but it is beyond dispute that the current system is inefficient and far too costly, an economist writes.

headline.main: Determining the Level of Payments in Health Care
